text: Need Andrew Clark for Mad Mex campaign. Budget around $5,178, looking for 2 x Instagram post, 1 x TikTok video, 1 x Product photography, 1 x 90-second product demo, 3 x 15-second TikTok. 10 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 10 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
